title: More Questions than Neutrinos in the Universe
post: It is this kind of pseudoscientific speculations that make so much harm. One picks up the last impacting headlines from a newspaper regarding a scientific challenge like that of the neutrinos and mixes it up with……..the Shroud to write a smart and “suggesting” question. Furthermore, the questions are wrongly formulated since neutrinos do not behave as described in the questions…..This path takes us nowhere.
author: Gabriel

title: More Questions than Neutrinos in the Universe
post: It is sad that being the Shroud one of the few “mysteries” that could actually be true, it is put at the same level as notorious fakes like UFOs, Mayan Calendar, astrology and so on.
